column1: When disabled, the extension has no impact on Magento e-mail sending routines.
column2: When disabled, the extension has no impact on Magento e-mail sending routines.

column1: Makes it possible to see the list of all e-mails ever sent through Magento, including email contents.
column2: Makes it possible to see the list of all e-mails ever sent through Magento, including email contents.

column1: When enabled, all debug information is logged. Recommended not to use on production sites.
column2: When enabled, all debug information is logged. Recommended not to use on production sites.

column1: Set to "Yes" to not actually send e-mails. Useful when logging is enabled, for debug/development purposes.
column2: Set to "Yes" to not actually send e-mails. Useful when logging is enabled, for debug/development purposes.

column1: Automatically remove old log records after specified number of days. If set to 0, will not auto clean.
